Here is the list of signs in $LINE, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Strong and ambitious, but also impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and materialistic.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and communicative, but also flighty and restless.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotional and nurturing, but also moody and clingy.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but also prideful and dominant.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but also perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, but also indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, but also secretive and manipulative.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but also reckless and blunt.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Disciplined and responsible, but also serious and distant.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but also unconventional and detached.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, but also dreamy and unrealistic.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations.
